elements.text: You are going on a long walk tomorrow with a friend who walks a long distance every day. You have not been on a long walk in quite some time, and you worry about whether you'll be able to keep up. You think you will match your friend's...

elements.name: Walking with a Friend_Social Situations_puzzle1
elements.incorrect_feedback: Whoops! That doesn't look right. Please wait a moment and try again.
